---
id: _third_party_copy_trade_leaderlistget
title: Leader List
sidebar_label: Leader List
description: /public/futures/user/v1/public/copy-trade/third/leader-list
---

## 接口

**GET** `/public/futures/user/v1/public/copy-trade/third/leader-list`

## 请求参数

| 名称        | 类型   | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明           | 范围      |
| ----------- | ------ | ---- | ------ | -------------- | --------- |
| `appId`     | String | 是   |        | app id         |           |
| `id`        | number | 否   |        | page id        |           |
| `direction` | String | 是   | NEXT   | page direction | NEXT/PREV |
| `limit`     | number | 是   | 10     | page limit     |           |

## 示例请求

### Java

```java
public String leadersGet(){


}
```

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "hasPrev": false, //has prev page
    "hasNext": false, //has next page
    "items": [
      {
        "accountId": 1920361759199, //leader account id
        "nickName": "qing", //leader nick name
        "recentMonthWinRate": "0.3333", // recent month win rate
        "followerCount": "2", //follower count
        "maxFollowerSize": 6, //max follower size
        "avatar": "" //avatar
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
